content: this one skein easy wear shawl will look beautiful with your favorite blue jeans on a saturday…… but honestly it will look great with anything on any day this pattern was designed for my friend dawn at the wooly cabin on etsy 1 using her blue jean saturday sock yarn i used all but 40 of the 463-yard skein this is a very easy pattern to adjust in size quit whenever you want in the pattern or make it bigger with more yarn 1 https //www etsy com/shop/thewoolycabin
